about_the_game:
Verde and the Echoing Water is a cozy city management game with a focus on the environment. Build the town of Dewdrop Valley, Supply water to the townsfolk, and restore harmony to the town of Dewdrop Valley!

Build the town!

Help the townsfolk build a sustainable town in this drought ravaged land. Build a variety of structures and facilities to help the townsfolk with their clean water crisis.

Build and plan piping!

Plan and build the piping system used to bring water to the townsfolk all around Dewdrop Valley. Build the right pipes on the right places to build an efficient piping system.

Experience a wholesome story about restoring nature!

Experience a story about a young boy without access to clean water and his journey in helping the people of Dewdrop Valley with their water crisis!
